message.content:
{"id": "2529", "title": "Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available", "description": "Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available. When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project item is not.", "OB": "When selecting both P1 and P2, it is noticed that the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project item is not.", "EB": "The Close Project menu item should be available when selecting multiple projects.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select P2.
3. Attempt to close the project."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '2529', 'title': 'Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)', 'description': 'Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now selectboth P1 and P2. ', 'OB': 'Notice the Open Project menu item is available butthe Close Project is not. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Create two projects P1 and P2. Select P2 and close it. '}
